article_title: Health Care: Mount Carmel's 24-hour hotline connects nurses, patients
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: Mount Carmel's "rapid response" hotline initially will be available to 24,000 local residents who are enrolled in MediGold, Mount Carmel's Medicare Advantage health plan. It eventually will be rolled out to those enrolled on the health plan for Mount Carmel employees, and then to the rest of the 200,000-plus patients who have an established relationship with Mount Carmel.
